column6: "IMAGINE WAR"  Mer-z-Bow approaches civil war â€" its first in over seven hundred years. Is Winter Soldier the catalyst? Bucky Barnes fights for his life. Crossbones sets the plan in motion. Quake and Ventolin join forces. The other Bucky Barnes came to the 616 part of the Multiverse to help. But did the man who helped end war just cause it in another universe?
